xmp_schema.label: $$$/AWS/FileInfoLib/Panels/Mobile/PanelName=Mobile SWF
xmp_schema.description: $$$/AWS/FileInfoLib/Panels/Mobile/PanelDescription=Lets you define metadata of a mobile SWF document.

xmp_property.name: maxstorage
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/swf/maxstorage_description=Persistent data storage for the SharedObject class; if not set, it is defined by the platform on the device
xmp_property.label: $$$/AWS/FileInfoLib/Panels/Mobile/PersistentStorage=Persistent Storage:

xmp_property.name: forwardlock
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/swf/forwardlock_description=Specifies if the content can be transferred to another device
xmp_property.label: $$$/AWS/FileInfoLib/Panels/Mobile/ForwardLock=Forward Lock:
